title: Structural Stability & Dynamics
description:
The course introduces the basic principles and concepts of
structural stability and dynamics. Students will learn to
understand the stability and dynamic characteristics of
structures and how they respond to quasi-static and time
varying loads. They will learn to apply the concept to civil
engineering structures through projects. The course covers
the behaviour of structures such as frames, beams and
trusses modelled as discrete and continuous system
subjected to quasi-static and dynamic loads. The course is
targeted to 4th year undergraduate students.
